      DELETE api/cards/{id} calls CardRestEndpoint.deleteCard(java.lang.Long) Permanently delete a card
      List<AccessControl> getAcls​(Long cardId)
      GET api/cards/{cardId}/ACLs calls CardRestEndpoint.getAcls(java.lang.Long) Retrieve the list of access-control for the given card
      List<ActivityFlowLink> getActivityFlowLinksAsNext​(Long cardId)
      GET api/cards/{id}/ActivityFlowLinksNextCard calls CardRestEndpoint.getActivityFlowLinksAsNext(java.lang.Long) Get all activity flow links of which the card is the next one

      GET api/cards/{id}/ActivityFlowLinksPreviousCard calls CardRestEndpoint.getActivityFlowLinksAsPrevious(java.lang.Long) Get all activity flow links of which the card is the previous one

      GET api/cards calls CardRestEndpoint.getAllCards() Retrieve the list of all cards.

      • getStickyNoteLinksAsSrc

        public List<StickyNoteLink> getStickyNoteLinksAsSrc​(Long cardId)
        GET api/cards/{id}/StickyNoteLinksSrcCard calls CardRestEndpoint.getStickyNoteLinksAsSrc(java.lang.Long) Get all sticky note links of which the card is the source
        Parameters:
        cardId - Card id of the searched links
        Returns:
        list of links

      • getAllCards

        public List<Card> getAllCards()
        GET api/cards calls CardRestEndpoint.getAllCards() Retrieve the list of all cards. This is available to admin only
        Returns:
        all known cards

      • getCard

        public Card getCard​(Long id)
        GET api/cards/{id} calls CardRestEndpoint.getCard(java.lang.Long) Get card identified by the given id
        Parameters:
        id - id of the card to fetch
        Returns:
        the card or null

      • createCard

        public Long createCard​(Card card)
        Deprecated.
        a priori there will be no need to directly create a card
        POST api/cards calls CardRestEndpoint.createCard(ch.colabproject.colab.api.model.card.Card) Persist the card
        Parameters:
        card - the card to persist
        Returns:
        id of the persisted new card

      • createNewCard

        public Card createNewCard​(Long parentId,
                          Long cardTypeId)
        POST api/cards/create/{parentId}/{cardTypeId} calls CardRestEndpoint.createNewCard(java.lang.Long, java.lang.Long) Create and persist a new card
        Parameters:
        parentId - id of the new card's parent
        cardTypeId - id of the card type of the new card
        Returns:
        the persisted new card

      • createNewCardWithDeliverable

        public Card createNewCardWithDeliverable​(Long parentId,
                                         Long cardTypeId,
                                         Document document)
        POST api/cards/createWithDeliverable/{parentId}/{cardTypeId} calls CardRestEndpoint.createNewCardWithDeliverable(java.lang.Long, java.lang.Long, ch.colabproject.colab.api.model.document.Document) Create and persist a new card
        Parameters:
        parentId - id of the new card's parent
        cardTypeId - id of the card type of the new card
        document - deliverable of the new card content
        Returns:
        the persisted new card

      • updateCard

        public void updateCard​(Card card)
        PUT api/cards calls CardRestEndpoint.updateCard(ch.colabproject.colab.api.model.card.Card) Save changes to database
        Parameters:
        card - card to update if the merge is not possible

      • moveCard

        public void moveCard​(Long cardId,
                     Long newParentId)
        PUT api/cards/{cardId}/MoveTo/{newParentId} calls CardRestEndpoint.moveCard(java.lang.Long, java.lang.Long) Move a card to a new parent
        Parameters:
        cardId - id of the card to move
        newParentId - id of the new parent
        Throws:
        HttpErrorMessage - if card or parent does not exist or if parent if a child of the card

      • deleteCard

        public void deleteCard​(Long id)
        DELETE api/cards/{id} calls CardRestEndpoint.deleteCard(java.lang.Long) Permanently delete a card
        Parameters:
        id - id of the card to delete
